---
title: JumpCloud SCIM v2.0
sidebar_label: JumpCloud SCIM v2.0
---

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # JumpCloud SCIM v2.0

translations.zh-CN: # JumpCloud SCIM v2.0

segments.source_content: The following guide will walk you through the process of configuring SAML Jackson to use the JumpCloud SCIM v2.0 directory provider.

translations.zh-CN: 本指南将引导您完成配置 SAML Jackson 使用 JumpCloud SCIM v2.0 目录服务提供商的流程。

segments.source_content: ### Create JumpCloud SAML Application

translations.zh-CN: ### 创建 JumpCloud SAML 应用

segments.source_content: JumpCloud only support configuring SCIM provisioning in an existing SAML application.

translations.zh-CN: JumpCloud 仅支持在现有 SAML 应用中配置 SCIM 供应功能。

segments.source_content: Choose an existing SAML application or create a new one. Click **SSO** from the left navigation menu and select your custom SAML application.

translations.zh-CN: 选择现有 SAML 应用或新建一个。从左导航菜单点击 **SSO** 并选择您的自定义 SAML 应用。

segments.source_content: ![JumpCloud SCIM Step 1](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/jumpcloud/1.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![JumpCloud SCIM 步骤 1](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/jumpcloud/1.png)

segments.source_content: Click the tab **Identity Management** within your SAML application.

translations.zh-CN: 在 SAML 应用内点击 **身份管理** 标签页。

segments.source_content: Under the **SCIM Version**, choose **SCIM 2.0** and enter the following information:

translations.zh-CN: 在 **SCIM 版本** 下选择 **SCIM 2.0** 并填写以下信息：

segments.source_content:
- Base URL
- Token Key
- Test User Email

translations.zh-CN:
- 基础 URL
- 令牌密钥
- 测试用户邮箱

segments.source_content: Click **Test Connection** to test the connection to see if the credentials are correct then click **Activate**.

translations.zh-CN: 点击 **测试连接** 验证凭证是否正确，然后点击 **激活**。

segments.source_content: Next click **Save** to save the settings.

translations.zh-CN: 接着点击 **保存** 存储设置。

segments.source_content: ![JumpCloud SCIM Step 2](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/jumpcloud/2.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![JumpCloud SCIM 步骤 2](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/jumpcloud/2.png)

segments.source_content: At this stage, you've successfully configured the JumpCloud SCIM app.

translations.zh-CN: 至此，您已成功配置 JumpCloud SCIM 应用。

segments.source_content: ### Assign Users & Push Groups

translations.zh-CN: ### 分配用户与推送群组

segments.source_content: ![JumpCloud SCIM Step 3](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/jumpcloud/3.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![JumpCloud SCIM 步骤 3](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/jumpcloud/3.png)

segments.source_content: Click the tab **User Groups** within your SAML application.

translations.zh-CN: 在 SAML 应用内点击 **用户群组** 标签页。

segments.source_content: You can see the all the groups that are available, select the groups you want to sync and click **Save**.

translations.zh-CN: 可查看所有可用群组，选择需要同步的群组后点击 **保存**。

segments.source_content: If no existing groups are available, click **User Groups** from the left navigation menu and click plus icon to create a new group.

translations.zh-CN: 若无现有群组，请从左导航菜单点击 **用户群组** 并点击加号图标创建新群组。

segments.source_content: Give the group a name.

translations.zh-CN: 为群组命名。

segments.source_content: ![JumpCloud SCIM Step 4](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/jumpcloud/4.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![JumpCloud SCIM 步骤 4](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/jumpcloud/4.png)

segments.source_content: Select the **Users** tab and choose the users you want to assign to the group.

translations.zh-CN: 选择 **用户** 标签页并勾选需要分配到该群组的用户。

segments.source_content: ![JumpCloud SCIM Step 5](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/jumpcloud/5.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![JumpCloud SCIM 步骤 5](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/jumpcloud/5.png)

segments.source_content: Next select the **Applications** tab and choose the app you want to assign the group to.

translations.zh-CN: 接着选择 **应用** 标签页并选择需要分配该群组的应用。

segments.source_content: ![JumpCloud SCIM Step 6](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/jumpcloud/6.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![JumpCloud SCIM 步骤 6](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/jumpcloud/6.png)

segments.source_content: At this stage, you've successfully assigned users and pushed the groups.

translations.zh-CN: 至此，您已成功分配用户并推送群组。
